resources.string: Warning! This step will cancel the registration and SIMSme will be reset.
Setting yourself to absent has failed.
Your account was deleted. It is possible that your telephone number was used on another device. Do you wish to reset your account on this device?
An error occurred during this action.

As we've recently informed you, SIMSme (now ginlo) has been handed over to Brabbler AG. That's why we'd like to ask for your consent (a) to transfer your contract and (b) to transfer your inventory, traffic, and message data to Brabbler Secure Message and Data Exchange AG (Brabbler AG) so that you can continue to use the messenger without restriction and to the same extent.
Your consent is voluntary, but if you don't give this consent, sending messages will no longer be possible as of %1$s and your account will be deactivated by %2$s. Further information on consent and your rights can be found %3$s.
Thank you!
Your SIMSme Team
You\'d like to continue using SIMSme (now ginlo) in the future? We\'re happy about that! So, don\'t wait and switch to Brabbler AG now.
Haven\'t had time yet to give your consent? Please take some time to agree to the provider change to Brabbler AG in order to continue using SIMSme (now ginlo).

Please agree to the provider change to Brabbler AG. Otherwise, you\'ll no longer be able to send messages as of now. And that would be a real pity. If you no longer want to use ginlo, please create a backup of your data.
If you want to send messages again with ginlo or create a backup of your data, please agree to the transfer of your contract to Brabbler AG now.
Your consent to the transfer of your data is required so that you can continue to use the messenger without restriction.
Please agree to the provider change.
You will need this key to restore your backup later. Please keep it secure. Alternatively, you can use the QR code below.
You haven\'t selected a backup and would overwrite the existing account with all data.
Would you like to overwrite your existing account?
Are you sure you want to continue?
Now let\'s find your backup to get your existing content in here.
Your backup has been stored in encrypted form. Please enter your backup password.
This telephone number is already registered with SIMSme, but we could not find a chat backup. A backup lets you transfer your existing chats, contacts and media. Creating a backup.
Here\'s the list of your backups.
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong while downloading your backup. Please try again.
Enter your backup password and a backup key here.
The backup function is available from SIMSme version 1.7. If you have an older version then this must be updated.
An error occurred when restoring your backups. The reason for this is that the connection to the server was lost, or that the backup is too old.
Restoration of the backup has failed. Unable to connect to the server. Please try again later.
Restoration of the backup has failed. The SIMSme server must be accessible for restoration. Please check your internet connection.
SIMSme has not created the backup.
The backup file could not be unpacked. Please select another backup.
The backup file could not be decrypted. The password may have been entered incorrectly. Please re-enter your password and start the restoration.
An error has occurred when searching for a backup.
It may take a few moments to restore the backup depending on the speed of your internet connection.
We could not find a backup.
Note: Only use \"Import Backup\" if you don\'t have access to ginlo Business on any other device.
You can set a password for backup recovery here. This password will not be stored. If you forget it, your backup can not be restored. For this reason, do not forget your password!
An error has occurred when changing the email address
The email address has been successfully changed
An error occurred while changing the phone number
It is already registered in the SIMSme account under this telephone number. Upon re-registering this will be overwritten. Do you wish to continue?
The phone number was changed successfully
Please enter your new mobile number.
The channel could not be unsubscribed. Communication with the server failed.
You have not activated a category and therefore will not receive channel notifications.
The content provider is responsible for all the content on the content channel and also for any additional links that may be used. Deutsche Post AG has no influence over this content.
Do you really want to stop following the channel?
Do you really want to deactivate the service?
The channel list could not be loaded. Communication with the server failed.
Channel may not have been updated. Communication with the server failed.
The channel content could not be loaded. Communication with the server failed.
Unfortunately, there are no channels available for your language settings.
An Internet connection is required in order to follow a channel.
The channel could not be followed. Communication with the server failed.

Welcome to the %1$s channel!

We'll make sure you always stay up to date.

A few small tips:
- You can access the Channel menu via the icon at the top right.
- You can follow new categories by clicking on "Information".
- When you deactivate "Sounds/Notifications", you will no longer receive any push notifications for messages.
- Click and hold down on a message to forward this message

Have fun!
Please confirm that you want to clear this chat.
Do you really want to delete this channel history?
Do you really want to delete this group history?
Do you really want to delete this chat?
Warning: You cannot receive any messages from this contact because this contact has been blocked.
Warning: The chat partner has been blocked.
You can’t send messages in this chat as the chat partner is blocked.
The SIMSme account is no longer available.\nExisting messages are still available.
No SIMSme user could be found with this telephone number.
Are you sure you want to reject this chat request and block the contact?
Are you sure you want to reject this group request?
Would you like to replace the existing text?
Please select one or more contacts before sending.
The signature of the message is invalid
The file cannot be sent to the unknown application because the file name is probably too long. Please try to shorten the name of the file.
The file is too large and cannot be sent.
The file has either been locked by another application or no application could be found to display the file.
No application has been found for selecting a file.
The file will be sent unencrypted to an unknown application! It will leave the secure area!
Are you sure you want to delete this group?
An error occurred when deleting the group.
An error occurred when deleting the member.
Are you sure you want to leave this group? All group members will be notified.
Are you sure you want to delete this group? All group members will be notified that you deleted to group.
%1$d Group member(s) could not receive this message type because an outdated SIMSme version.
This group no longer exists – please create a new group.
An error occurred when opening the attachment.
The SIMSme version of the receiver does not yet support this message type.
You will once again receive messages for this chat after mute has elapsed. You can find general control options for messages in the settings.
Unable to open the audio message.
No application has been found for selecting the file.
The file will be sent unencrypted to an unknown application! It will leave the secure area!
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong while forwarding your message. Please contact our Customer Care at support@ginlo.net.
Unable to access the download directory.
The chat has been exported successfully.
Are some of your friends still not on SIMSme? Then invite them now!
You seem to enjoy using SIMSme.\nDo you want to invite more friends?
You cannot send yourself a message
There is not enough information available to import the file.
No application has been found for sharing the file.
%1$s has signed in to SIMSme again.
%1$s has signed back in to SIMSme.\nHence, this chat has been closed.\nYou can start a new chat with this user.
This video is %1$d seconds too long. The maximum length of a video is %2$d seconds.
This file is corrupted or in the wrong format
One or more files could not be imported.
Not all files could be imported as the maximum number has been exceeded.
There is no text available to send.
The attachment is no longer available
Decide whether other users can see your profile name in push messages. Note: The user name is sent unencrypted.
Warning! Your licence will expire in %1$s days.
Please select a date in the future
The self-destruct time is earlier than the sending time.
The image is no longer available
Touch the screen\nto display the image
The message is no longer available
Touch the screen\nto display the message
The video is no longer available
Touch the screen\nto play the video
The voicemail is no longer available
Select a date and a year.
The audio message cannot be sent because it is corrupted.
Still %1$s days to TEST -\nGet your\'s license here
SIMSme now offers you services as well.
This contact is no longer blocked
An error occurred when loading the contacts.
None of your contacts are using SIMSme.
There are no contacts in the phone book.

Hi,\n\nI would like to invite you to join SIMSme! SIMSme is the messaging app from Deutsche Post that encrypts every message you send. Download it for free and let\'s chat! Get it here: https://sims.me/getsimsme
QR code validation has failed. Please try again.
Please search directly by name, email address, department or SIMSme ID
Join me on ginlo, the secure messenger for private and confidential communication - made in Germany. Download it here: ginlo.net/join
Sort list in descending alphabetical order
Sort list in ascending alphabetical order
The contact could not be added to the phone book.
Send a message to this contact
Do you want to register with SIMSme using the phone number %1$s?
Do you want to register with SIMSme using the email address %1$s?
An error occurred when creating the account.
Unable to add all users to the group.
Are you sure you want to delete this contact?
The message could not be removed from the server
The time-delayed messages could not be removed from the server
An error occurred when applying the changes.
You are about to cancel the device pairing.
Confirm the new device, if the device name is shown and the security number are shown identical.
The new device has been successfully added. The server synchronisation may take a moment.
All data will be deleted after the session
Scan the QR code with your new device or enter the activation code manually when logging in.
An error has occurred during deleting.
Log into your existing account with your login details and assign a device name.
Please enter a correct SIMSme ID! This must contain 8 characters.
Add a new device in the settings of a recognised device and scan the activation code or enter manually.
An error occurred when adding the device. Please check the activation code you entered.
Invalid QR code. Please check your QR code.
Please enter the activation code here.
Compare the security number shown here on the recognised device and then confirm the pairing of the devices.
Wait for the confirmation by the recognised device
An error occurred during loading of the devices.
What would you like to be notified of?

Yes, please notify me via SIMSme as soon as there is news of my DHL parcels on occasions chosen by me. I agree that my consent to the fulfilment of the terms of my contract with DHL Paket GmbH will be passed onto them. I can at any time withdraw my consent to receive notifications on the occasions determined by me, either through the deactivation of the controls or in settings, by deactivating the entire service.
This mobile phone number is not linked to a DHL customer account
Please check that your mobile phone number has been entered correctly in your DHL customer details and is the same as the number of this mobile phone.
We could not find a DHL customer account to match your mobile phone number %1$s.
No matching DHL customer account found
Register as a new customer with DHL so that you can receive notifications via SIMSme.
This postcode does not match the DHL customer account
We could not find a DHL customer account to match your mobile phone number and the postcode provided.
No matching DHL customer account found
Register as a new customer with DHL so that you can receive notifications via SIMSme.
By accepting you agree that your mobile phone number will be passed onto DHL to check service availability. Your mobile phone number will not be retained by DHL or used for any other purpose.
From now on you can receive notifications of the delivery of your DHL parcels directly via SIMSme. Simply activate the new service for your DHL customer account.
For identification, we need the postcode that you have given to DHL. You\'ll find it in your DHL customer account under \'My details\'.
Your license will expire in less than a week. Please request a license extension from your administrator.
Your license has expired. Please request a license extension from your administrator.
Even more features with the SIMSme Business Messenger
Please enter the password to continue with the registration.
Could not create group. Please try again later.
Unable to update the group name and image.
Unable to update members of the group.
An error occurred during the device pairing.
The sending of location data has been prohibited by the administrator.
Copy and paste has been prohibited by the administrator.
Access to the camera has been prohibited by the administrator.
The saving of contacts has been prohibited by the administrator.
Administrator has denied access to the media.
Authorization failed. You may have added a new fingerprint.
Unable to register the device for the push notifications service. To try again, close SIMSme using the back button and restart the app.
An error occurred while transferring your encrypted contacts to the server.
%1$d of %2$d encrypted contacts were transferred to the server
Whether in the office or on the go - communicate quickly, directly and reliably.\nGet started now!
By clicking on "Accept & continue" you accept the %1$s
SIMSme is a messenger service featuring a combination of the maximum possible degree of security and ease of use.
Deutsche Post AG guarantees the security of your information. With true end to-end encryption and a server located in Germany.
Now set up SIMSme for yourself and set your password. Your password is not transmitted to us and cannot be reset. So make sure to remember it!
Please accept the Terms of Use
Please wait a moment while we create your account
Error validating security certificate. Please check to see if a new version of SIMSme is available.
A connection to the server could not be established. Error code: AND-0029
Unable to identify your current location.
Location services are disabled. Please activate them so that you can share your exact location."
The password is incorrect. You have %1$d attempts remaining.
Loading company directory from the server …
Loading contact information from the server …
Preparing contacts for the private directory …
Transferring encrypted contacts to the server …
An error occurred during the migration.
Search for contacts on the SIMSme server
Would you like to search for the contact with SIMSme or send an invitation?
The account was deleted. The application will be reset.
We were unable to recognize your account. Please re-register.\n\nNote: The confirmation code is only valid for 30 minutes.

Unfortunately, it was not possible to register the device for notifications. Please go to Settings/Energy-saving mode and make sure that the application is able to run in the background and then restart the application.
No compatible application has been found.
Your device is in energy-saving mode. You will not receive any notifications. Please deactivate energy-saving mode.
You can now activate the preview in push notifications. This will display messages decrypted in the preview. Security is higher when the preview is deactivated.
As the app has been closed, the login information is no longer available. You will need to sign up again.
The email address has been changed. This change must be confirmed.
The email address has been changed but not yet verified. Are you sure you want to do this now?
The phone number has been changed. This change must be confirmed.
The phone number has been changed but not yet verified. Are you sure you want to do this now?
SIMSme requires access to your camera in order for you to record photos and videos.
SIMSme requires access to your phone/address book to check which of your contacts also uses SIMSme.
SIMSme requires access to your location in order for to send this to your contacts.
SIMSme requires access to your storage in order for you to save media from your smartphone in SIMSme.
ginlo requires access to your microphone in order for you to record audio messages.
SIMSme requires access to your storage in order for you to save media from SIMSme to your smartphone.
ginlo needs permission to use your microphone. You can set this permission in your device\'s app settings.
If the preview function is deactivated, SIMSme must be opened first to view the content of new messages. Security is higher in this case.
The email address has been changed. Please confirm the new email address.
The mobile number has been changed. Please confirm the new mobile number.
Do you like SIMSme? If so, please rate it. Thanks for your support!
Video recording stopped. The maximum file size for this video has been reached.
Check the selected channel and enter the recovery code to unlock your account here.

The code entered is not correct. Please try again.
Please enter a correct professional email address.
Please enter your first and last names.
This email address is already in use! Do you want to continue anyway?

Before you start, you please familiarize yourself with our Terms of Use.
I have read the Terms of Use and hereby agree with them.
We have sent an email to your email address %1$s.
The password prompt serves to ensure the security of your communication. Should the password be requested when unlocking SIMSme?

Activate the simple code for a 4-digit number code.
Hit “Accept & continue” to accept the Terms & Conditions .
Please enter the code to continue
Your country code and phone number
Please enter your telephone number It must contain at least 6 characters.

Please set a password for this installation. This password is also needed when importing a backup. Do not lose your password.
The PIN must consist of 4 characters.
The profile name is not valid.
The password no longer meets the password guidelines. A new password must be set.
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong on our end. Please contact our Customer Care at support@ginlo.net.

SIMSme encrypts all your messages in a secure and reliable manner as they travel from your device to the recipient\'s device — the messages cannot even be read from our servers. SIMSme also offers a number of other features that make your communication as secure as possible:
You have met in person and scanned the QR code
Your contact is using SIMSme. Ask them.
You have already been in contact via SIMSme
The symbols indicate the status of your message
You will be asked to enter the password after the app has been in the background for this number of minutes.
Determines how many minutes the program will be running in the background before it requests your password.
The password could not be changed.
The backup password is only valid for newly created backups.
We\'re sorry, but something went wrong while creating your backup. Please try again.
Save your chat history and media in a backup. You can then restore your chats, contacts, and media if you lose your smartphone or change to a new one.
Please create your initial backup by tapping \"Create Backup Now\". You can then set an interval, so that your app is regularly backed up.
Set your password for saving backups.
This password encrypts your backup data.
Set whether SIMSme should automatically create a backup of your account information. The backup will be stored securely on the server.
Determines whether SIMSme automatically creates a backup of your account information. The backup will be stored securely on the server.
Set a background image for the chat view.
Choose the image you want to display as a background in the chats.
If you activate this option, all media that you receive is automatically saved on your phone and can be viewed outside of SIMSme.

Deleting your account will irreversibly delete all of your chat history and SIMSme media. Your backups will become unusable.
Enter the SIMSme ID from your profile.
Determines whether a read confirmation should be displayed to your chat partners.
The password prompt that appears whenever SIMSme is started serves to further improve the security of your communication. Do you really want to disable the prompt?
Set the image quality for photos sent.
*Sending an SMS may incur costs from your mobile operator.
Set whether a sound should be played when a channel message is received.
Set whether to receive a notification when a channel message is received.
Set whether a sound should be played when a private message is received.
Set whether a sound should be played when a message is received.
Set whether to receive notifications when a private message is received.
Set whether to receive notifications when a private message is received.
Set whether to receive notifications when a call is received.
Set whether to receive notifications when a call is received.
Set whether a sound should be played when a group message is received.
Set whether to receive notifications when a group message is received.
Set whether to receive notifications when a group message is received.
Set whether to receive notifications when a service message is received.
Set whether the data within SIMSme should be deleted after a certain number of failed attempts.
Set the numbers attempts before all data is deleted from SIMSme.
Set whether the password should be requested when starting the app.
Set whether the password should be requested when starting the app.
The app will be reset and all content permanently deleted
We cannot reset your password. The app must be reset in order to create a new password. Please enter your telephone number to restore access to all of your SIMSme contacts.
If you have forgotten your password, you can use a recovery code to unlock your account. Select the channel via which you would like to receive the code.
This will delete all active chats.
Please assign an individual device password now. You can make changes at any time under settings.
Set whether a sound should be played when a message self-destructs.
Set whether a sound should be played when a message is sent.
Sets whether this app can download messages in the background.
Decide whether other users can see your profile name in push messages. Note: The user name is sent unencrypted.
Set whether notifications should be shown within the app.
Data Privacy Notice SIMSme for Private Customers
Warning: The deletion of your account cannot be undone.
Are you sure you want to delete your account?
The ID you entered does not match the Account ID.
The SIMSme ID was copied to the clipboard.
Increase your trust status with your friends and have your profile code scanned
An error occurred when saving the profile.
An error occurred when saving the status.
Error during creation of the recovery code

Specifies, whether upon forgetting the password, the app access can be restored using a recovery code. If you forget your password, there is no possibility of unlocking the messenger if the recovery code is deactivated. Security is higher in this case.
An error occurred when saving the setting.
